name: @nostr-dev-kit/ndk-cache-sqlite-wasm
description: SQLite WASM cache adapter for NDK, compatible with browser and JS environments.

scripts.build: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile ./dist/index.mjs --format esm --target browser && bun build ./src/worker.ts --outfile ./dist/worker.js --format esm --target browser && cp ./example/sql-wasm.wasm ./dist/sql-wasm.wasm
